General.Name: Cobra Resources PLC
General.Description: Cobra Resources plc, together with its subsidiaries, explores, develops, and mines precious and base metal projects. The company explores for gold, copper, and iron oxide deposits. It primarily focuses on the Wudinna Gold project comprising one mining and exploration licence covering an area of 3,261 square kilometers located in Gawler Craton, South Australia. In addition, it holds 100% interest in the Prince Alfred project located in South Australia. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
